root: ^Good job! Now let's review all you learned so far.
^You can't avoid stress, so you need to learn how to manage it instead.
^You can manage stress by mindful breathing, or following the Bilog ng Buhay.
^The Bilog ng Buhay has four parts: Kapwa, Kabuluhan, Kalooban and Kakayanan.
^By remembering how to perform mindful breathing and the Bilog ng Buhay, you should be ready to manage your stress from now on!
